target.rawSql:
SELECT "time",
       "timeend",
       'Charging' AS "title",
       'Charging ('
              || ("timeend"-"time")
              || ')' AS "text",
       "id"
FROM   (
                SELECT   *,
                         "first_date"                                           AS "time",
                         Lag("state") OVER (ORDER BY "first_date") AS "before_charging_state",
                         (
                                  SELECT   "first_date" AS "timeend"
                                  FROM     charging_states        AS charging_states2
                                  WHERE    charging_states2."state" NOT IN ('CHARGING', 'CONSERVATION')
                                  AND      charging_states.vin = charging_states2.vin
                                  AND      charging_states."first_date" < charging_states2."first_date"
                                  ORDER BY "first_date" limit 1) "timeend"
                FROM     charging_states 
                WHERE    vin = '${VIN}'
                ) AS data
WHERE  "state" IN ('CHARGING', 'CONSERVATION')
AND ("timeend"-"time") < INTERVAL '1 day'
AND    "before_charging_state" NOT IN ('CHARGING', 'CONSERVATION')
AND ($__timeFilter("time") OR $__timeFilter("timeend"))

links.title: Edit Session
links.tooltip: Edit the session in the database

panels.description: Battery state of charge and range during the charging session.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "range" AS "Electric Range",
  drives.drive_id as "Drive"
FROM drive_ranges
LEFT JOIN drives ON drive_ranges.drive_id = drives.id
WHERE
  drives.vin = '$VIN'
  AND drives.type = 'ELECTRIC'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "range" AS "Electric Range",
  drives.drive_id as "Drive"
FROM drive_ranges
LEFT JOIN drives ON drive_ranges.drive_id = drives.id
WHERE
  drives.vin = '$VIN'
  AND drives.type = 'ELECTRIC'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "level" AS "Level",
  drives.drive_id as "Drive"
FROM drive_levels
LEFT JOIN drives ON drive_levels.drive_id = drives.id
WHERE
  drives.vin = '$VIN'
  AND drives.type = 'ELECTRIC'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "level" AS "Level",
  drives.drive_id as "Drive"
FROM drive_levels
LEFT JOIN drives ON drive_levels.drive_id = drives.id
WHERE
  drives.vin = '$VIN'
  AND drives.type = 'ELECTRIC'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

panels.title: Battery Level

panels.description: Times of the charging session. Start/End, Plugging/Unplugging, Locking/Unlocking

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
BEGIN
IF ${id:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No id was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Charging Sessions dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;
SELECT
  plug_connected_date AS "Connected",
  plug_locked_date AS "Locked",
  session_start_date AS "Started",
  session_end_date AS "Ended",
  plug_unlocked_date AS "Unlocked",
  plug_disconnected_date AS "Disconnected"
FROM charging_sessions
WHERE
  id = $id

panels.title: Times

panels.description: Used power and charging rate during the charging session.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "power" AS "Charging Power"
FROM charging_powers 
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "power" AS "Charging Power"
FROM charging_powers
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "rate" AS "Charging Rate"
FROM charging_rates
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "rate" AS "Charging Rate"
FROM charging_rates 
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "battery_temperature" AS "Battery Temperature"
FROM battery_temperatures
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "battery_temperature" AS "Battery Temperature"
FROM battery_temperatures
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "outside_temperature" AS "Outside Temperature"
FROM outside_temperatures 
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "outside_temperature" AS "Outside Temperature"
FROM outside_temperatures 
WHERE
  vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

panels.title: Charging

panels.description: Details of the charging session. The amount is estimated based on the state of charge before and after charging. If you want to work with the real amount and cost in the statistics you can add this data using the edit button.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
begin
IF ${id:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No id was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Charging Sessions dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;
SELECT
  EXTRACT('epoch' FROM (COALESCE (session_end_date, COALESCE (plug_unlocked_date, plug_disconnected_date)) - COALESCE (session_start_date, COALESCE (plug_locked_date, plug_connected_date)))) AS "Duration",
  (COALESCE("real_charged", COALESCE(("meter_end_kwh" - "meter_start_kwh"), ("end_level" - "start_level") * (
    capacity / 100::NUMERIC)))) / (EXTRACT(epoch FROM (COALESCE(session_end_date, COALESCE(plug_unlocked_date, plug_disconnected_date)) - COALESCE(session_start_date, COALESCE (plug_locked_date, plug_connected_date))))::NUMERIC / 3600::NUMERIC) AS "Average Charge Power",
  charging_type AS "AC/DC",
  "start_level" AS "% Start",
  "end_level" AS "% End",
  ("end_level" - "start_level") * (capacity / 100::NUMERIC) AS "Amount (estimated)",
  COALESCE("real_charged", ("meter_end_kwh" - "meter_start_kwh")) AS "Amount (real)",
  "real_cost"::NUMERIC/100::NUMERIC AS "Cost (real)",
  "session_odometer" AS "Odometer",
  string_agg(charging_sessions_tags.tags_name, ', ') AS "Tags"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
LEFT JOIN charging_sessions_tags on charging_sessions.id = charging_sessions_tags.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
charging_sessions.id = ${id}
GROUP BY session_end_date, plug_unlocked_date, plug_disconnected_date, session_start_date, plug_locked_date, plug_connected_date, "end_level", "start_level", "capacity", charging_type, "real_charged", "meter_end_kwh", "meter_start_kwh", "real_cost", "session_odometer"

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Temperature of the high voltage battery. This value is not available on all cars

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
    ("temperatureHvBatteryMin_K" - 273.15) AS "Minimum",
    ("temperatureHvBatteryMax_K" - 273.15) AS "Maximum"
FROM
    battery_temperature
WHERE
    $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
    vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY
    "carCapturedTimestamp" DESC

panels.title: Battery Temperature

panels.description: Shows the charging state the car was in.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "first_date" AS "time",
  "state" AS "Charging"
FROM charging_states
WHERE
  charging_states.vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
UNION
SELECT
  "last_date" AS "time",
  "state" AS "Connection"
FROM charging_states
WHERE
  charging_states.vin = '$VIN'
  AND ($__timeFilter("first_date") OR $__timeFilter("last_date"))
ORDER BY "time" ASC

panels.title: States

panels.description: Charger of this charging session. If no data is provided your car might not provide location data. You can still set the location using the edit button.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
begin
IF ${id:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No id was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Charges dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;
SELECT
  charging_stations.name AS "Name",
  charging_stations.address AS "Address",
  charging_stations.max_power AS "Max Power",
  charging_stations.num_spots AS "Spots",
  operator_name AS "Operator"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_stations ON charging_station_uid = charging_stations.uid
WHERE
  charging_sessions.id = ${id}

panels.title: Charger

panels.description: Location of the car when charging (green) and the used charger (red). If no location is shown you can add the location data using the edit button.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(charging_stations.latitude, 'NaN') AS "Latitude Charger",
  COALESCE(charging_stations.longitude, 'NaN') AS "Longitude Charger",
  COALESCE(session_position_latitude, 'NaN') AS "Latitude Parking",
  COALESCE(session_position_longitude, 'NaN') AS "Longitude Parking",
  COALESCE("real_charged", ("end_level" - "start_level") * capacity / 100::NUMERIC) AS "Amount Charged"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_stations ON charging_sessions.charging_station_uid = charging_stations.uid
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN drives ON vehicles.vin = drives.vin
WHERE
  charging_sessions.id = $id
  AND drives.type = 'ELECTRIC'

panels.title: Charging Location

panels.description: Charging location of the session. If no data is provided your car might not provide location data. You can still set the location using the edit button.

targets.rawSql:
DO $$ 
begin
IF ${id:singlequote} = 'none' THEN
  RAISE EXCEPTION 'No id was given, you have to navigate to this dashboard using a link from Charges dashboard';
END IF;
END $$;
SELECT
  locations.name AS "Name",
  locations.amenity AS "Amenity",
  (locations.road || COALESCE(' '||locations.house_number, '')) AS "Street",
  locations.neighbourhood AS "Neighbourhood",
  locations.postcode AS "Postcode",
  locations.city AS "City",
  locations.state AS "State",
  locations.country AS "Country",
  locations.source AS "Source"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN locations on charging_sessions.location_uid = locations.uid
WHERE
  id = $id

panels.title: Location

list.definition: SELECT charging_station_uid FROM charging_sessions WHERE charging_sessions.id = $id
list.name: charging_station_id
list.query: SELECT charging_station_uid FROM charging_sessions WHERE charging_sessions.id = $id
